item.title: 9. Dazing With a New Guest

item.itunes:keywords: Flush, Flush Media, Intellectually Dishonest, Chris, politics, Caleb, Azurras, Daisy

item.itunes:title: Dazing With a New Guest
item.description:
On this episode of The Flush Podcast, we have a new guest Daisy from the Daze of My Life Podcast. She joins us to talk about women in tech, WFH tips, dating in your 20's and much more.
Flush Media Website: http://www.flushmedia.org
Flush Media Discord Server: https://discord.gg/xR2FG3U

item.title: 8. Don’t Listen to This Pod Ironically
item.itunes:author: Chris and Caleb
item.itunes:keywords: Flush, Flush Media, Intellectually Dishonest, Chris, politics, Caleb, Azurras
item.itunes:subtitle: Flush Media
item.itunes:title: Don’t Listen to This Pod Ironically
item.description:
On this episode of The Flush Podcast we talk about... what exactly is a credit report? Kanye For President? The oldguards of the GOP are moving forward with Trump. Why did Pusha T diss Drake again? and new updates with the website and blogs!

Check Out Our Website! http://www.flushmedia.org
Join Our Discord! https://discord.gg/xR2FG3U

Chris's Twitter: https://twitter.com/Azurras

item.itunes:title: Jon John Johnny
item.description:
On this episode of The Flush Podcast! We talk with our long time friend, John! He shares some of his details of his work life with us. After, we talk about CHAZ, Kanye's new music, and the latest news about the Flush website.

Check Out Our Website! http://www.flushmedia.org
Join Our Discord! https://discord.gg/xR2FG3U

item.itunes:title: Corona Sucks Man
item.description:
On this episode of The Flush Podcast!!!! We talk about the second wave of the coronavirus, Krystal Ball and her show the Rising, Trump's latest poll numbers, and the lack of media during covid.
